meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing platinum.
meanings.sent1: The platinous jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was made of platinous metal.
meanings.sent3: The platinous ring was so shiny, it blinded everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The platinous crown on the queen's head symbolized her royal status.
meanings.sent5: The platinous coin was so rare that collectors traveled far to see it.

meanings.definition: Having a valence lower than that of a corresponding platinic compound.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the platinous solution in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The platinous compound reacted differently than expected.
meanings.sent3: The platinous reaction in the beaker turned the liquid purple.
meanings.sent4: The platinous element stood out among the other compounds.
meanings.sent5: The platinous mixture created a unique color never seen before.
